activities:
Crown Worldwide Group (including its subsidiaries) receives and collects personal information from its customers and/or their employers and confidentially processes the information according to the customers' request. Personal information is also collected internally from employees for human resource purposes.

Crown only collects information voluntarily submitted by its customers and employers for processing in accordance with the services to be provided.

Crown only processes submitted information only for the legitimate purposes for which the information had been collected.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: American Arbitration Association (AAA), ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program for non-human resources data. Crown Worldwide (including its subsidiaries) agrees to cooperate with the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) for complaints involving the collection of human resource data.
